chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following problem:

Hello, I wanted to make a payment in 4 installments using PayPal, but it took all my money at once. I'd like to be able to cancel the order and place an order again with the multiple payment option.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded.

Regards,
JY
